snippet: Apple issued $17 billion of bonds, a record amount. | Wall Street and foreign finance ministers are fighting a proposal to require overseas offices of American-based financial firms to turn over information on certain foreign trades. | Venture...
abstract: Apple issued $17 billion of bonds, a record amount. | Wall Street and foreign finance ministers are fighting a proposal to require overseas offices of American-based financial firms to turn over information on certain foreign trades. | Venture capital investments can be brutal for founders and employees. | Yahoo’s deal for Dailymotion has fallen through after opposition from France.
